_description: The Seven Works of Spiritual Mercy — eight couplets

CULFf238.First Lines:
Teche eche man with charyteTo kepe goddes heestes buxum to
                    beTo counseyle eche man with mylde steuenTo take the wey that
                    ledyþ to heuene…
CULFf238.Last Lines:
…Of these werkys goostly cryst schall appeleWhan he hys dome
                    schall deme and dele
CULFf238.Attributed Title: Here suen þe vii werkes of merci gostli (f. 32va)
CULFf238.Facsimiles:
McSparran,  Frances,  and  Pamela R. Robinson.  
             “Introduction.” 
             Cambridge University Library MS Ff.2.38.
         London: Scolar Press, 1979.

CamMagPep1584.First Lines:
Teche euery man with chariteto kepe goddes hestis buxom to
                    beTo counceile euery man with mylde stevynTo take þat wey
                    þat ledith to heuyn…
CamMagPep1584.Last Lines:
…Of their workis gostly crist schall appeleWhan he his dome
                    schall deme and dele
CamMagPep1584.Attributed Title: Thes byn the vii werkys of mercy goostely (f. 106v)

Lam491.First Lines:
Teche ich man with chariteTo kepe godes bydynges
                    buxumly…
Lam491.Last Lines:
…Of al þis werkes criste wyl appeleWhene he hys dome shal
                    deme & dele
